name: SimRaceDash
description:
Please download new version of the plugin with 1.0.3 app

This is a dashboard for Rfactor2, Rfactor ,GSCE ,AUTOMOBILISTA simulators.

You need the plugin to be able to connect with this app, you can download it here

rfactor2 64bit: http://www.acmedevelop.com/downloads/SimRaceDashPlugin_x64-1.0.1.dll
rfactor2 32bit: http://www.acmedevelop.com/downloads/SimRaceDashPlugin_x86-1.0.1.dll

rfactor1 and gsc: http://www.acmedevelop.com/downloads/SimRaceDash_rf1-1.0.1.dll

You can see all the (almost) information from your sim, such as tyre temp, tyre wear, pressure, fuel, sped, position.
The dashboard show also the blue flags(only RF2) , led for speed limit, pit, higlights, engine failure ... and much more will come in the feature!!

You can also customize all the font colors, and also disable what you dont want on the screen...

Instruction here:
http://www.acmedevelop.com/simracedash.php
